item.description:
Lets enjoy a day on the Charles River!

We'll meet at the Cambridge/Kendall Square location and then paddle down the river where we will see a phenomenal view of the Boston skyline, the Esplanade, as well as other nearby landmarks like the Zakim Bridge, M.I.T., the Museum of Science, and Boston University.

This is a nine-mile stretch of river that has no current, allowing painless round trips. Depending upon stops, round trip is about 5 to 6 hours. They also offer one-way trips - we can see what everybody wants to do when we arrive.
View map of our route: http://www.paddlebost...

One day kayak rentals, or rent by the hour:
Single $60 or $15/hour
Double $72 or $18/hour Please post or contact person you'd like to double up with.

After our trip for those who wish we will visit the pubs in either Boston or Cambridge and have dinner.

* Broad Canal Street is a private way that does not appear on most maps.
GPS address - Rental Center: 370 3rd Street, Cambridge, turn right.
GPS address - Parking Garage: 350 Kendall Street, Cambridge.

RAIN DATE: Sunday, Sept. 19th
item.name: Kayaking on the Charles & Evening in Boston
